name: Klondike Solitaire: Kingdom
description:
Klondike Solitaire: Kingdom is a classic Klondike Solitaire game for everyone in love with Klondike Solitaire to enjoy.

FEATURES
• Classic Klondike Solitaire
• Offline availability
- lets you play offline anytime.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Simple, yet, flawless visual effects

• Designed for both iPhone & iPad.

NOTES
• "Klondike Solitaire: Kingdom" contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• "Klondike Solitaire: Kingdom" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE.

E-MAIL
